page.title: 07Daily life-Downsview School.
page.content: There is no uniform and assemblies are held every day.The children have a morning and afternoon break and 2 dinner sittings,the dinners cost 60p a day. All the pupils go swimming to White Oak pool and they enter a team for the gala.Downsview has netball,rounders, football,athletics,cross country,chess and gymnastics teams.Lots of clubs are held in the school,badmington,computer, choir,birdclub,recorder,country and modern dance. Pupils are allowed to talk in class, they do not do compulsory homework but may do it voluntarily.The classes go on school outings every term and school journeys every year.They do the same lessons as all the other schools but do not have sex education.
